property.name: AMBARI_ADMIN
property.description: the name of the ambari admin user (admin?)

property.name: AMBARI_ADMIN_PASS
property.description: The password for the ambari admin (admin?)

property.name: www_folder
property.description: Where to put the web files?

property.name: servername
property.description: The name of the server. if blank or set to 'hostname', use the evaluated hostname (probably fqdn)

property.name: customlinks
property.description: JSON description of any custom links in your cluster. Format like {"NameOfLink":"href"} e.g. {"MyDashboard":"http://node001:8275/dash"}

property.name: template_000_default
property.value: # Created automatically with Ambari # All manual changes will be undone in the case of a server restart # Edit the template through the Ambari interface instead TraceEnable Off RequestHeader unset Proxy early ServerSignature Off ServerTokens Prod Listen {{PORT}} ServerName "{{servername}}" DocumentRoot "{{www_folder}}"
property.description: In order to ensure the settings we make are picked up, such as the port number, we create 0000_default.conf in the apache directory Advanced users will want to edit this manually.
